programs.title: Level Up Globally
programs.description: An expert alumni talk by Sri Vignesh Devarajan on studying and working opportunities in Germany, covering tuition fees, accommodation, and global career exposure.

programs.title: Internship Awareness Drive
programs.description: A two-day awareness program where senior students shared internship preparation strategies including resume building, aptitude skills, and interview hacks.

programs.title: Brain Buzz – Weekly Quiz Launch
programs.description: A weekly interactive quiz initiative conducted every Friday on Instagram Stories to boost vocabulary, general knowledge, and current affairs awareness.

events.title: Vocal Vista – Communication Development Program
events.description: Vocal Vista was a two-day interactive communication development event for first-year students aimed at reducing stage fear, building confidence, and enhancing effective speaking skills through fun, team-based activities like storytelling, creative pitching, and impromptu speaking. The event was guided by jury Dr. ARS Jayanth, Professor, DASH – MIT. Participants rated the event 4.21/5 with 88.7% showing interest in future PDA programs.

events.title: CRESTORA’25 – Interdepartmental Talent Festival
events.description: CRESTORA’25 is PDA’s flagship 10-round interdepartmental talent odyssey conducted with 12+ clubs, focusing on creativity, communication, teamwork, innovation, analytical thinking, and personality development across diverse competitive and rolling events.
